title: I just want a RiP or L thread is all
body:
I bought the Arcade Pass because i figure id start buying prestige points because i figure id have at least one and i've never had prestige points before.

I didn't know i had to pay real money and then also grind missions because i read it wrong and i only have 1 day and i know i won't have time so i can't bother with it.

Can i get a RiP for wasting money and disappointing myself lol
